Name: Human Constructor VR
About the game: Human Constructor VR is a virtual reality application designed for detailed study of the human structure and individual organs, bones, and muscles. This application contains only the anatomy of the male human body. First of all, Human Constructor VR can be used by ordinary users who are not specialists in the medical sphere. It will be useful for them to learn and get acquainted with the structure of their body. Using a special tablet used in this application, you can view the human body from different angles: tilt it forward/backward, rotate it or raise it up/down. You can display all human organ systems simultaneously also you can display each human organ systems separately. User can take each organ, bone, muscle with virtual hands, and consider them in more detail, and using the scanner, you can display their names. Human Constructor VR contains the following human organ systems: the excretory system; the respiratory system; the lymphatic system; the nervous system; the human musculoskeletal system; the human digestive system; the reproductive system; the sensor system; the cardiovascular system; the endocrine system. Human Constructor VR supports SteamVR and Oculus .
